page.title: 04Character of Baston locale.
page.content: This is a quiet,{rural community}where changes,if any,take place slowly. The {population}has a close relationship with each other and many families have lived here for generations. Outsiders are treated in a friendly and polite manner but are not totally intergrated until about 20 years have passed. Many of the trades and occupations are connected with the land, but some new businesses have been set up e.g.printing;mail order car parts. The {social life}tends to centre around the pub and church, W.I. and school fetes. There is very little of entertaining of friends in private houses. The biggest change has been the establishment of a{private school} catering for about 400 children who come from a radius of 40 miles. The school is the biggest employer in the village but some animosity exists.
